title: 2 Feed 2 Carry Community Looking for Member
body:
International League of Leends Community

2 Feed 2 Carry:

We are 2 Feed 2 Carry, we are a new community and looking for more members who are active and will play rankeds and normals with us.
We want to grow and in the end make our own ranked teams who will participate in tournaments.

What we have to offer:

-TS3-Server
-Vriendly and soicial atmosphere in TS
-Maturity
-The possibility to grow with our community

2 Feed 2 Carry

Short introduction
What do we want to accomplish?
What do we have to offer you?
What do we want to offer you in the future?
Your qualifications.
We are looking for recruiters
How to contact us

1 Short introduction:

Through alot of expierience with helping other clans/communities we assembled our now standing Admit team who created 2 Feed 2 Carry.
We want to create honorary ranked teams together with you.

What do we want to accomplish?

2 Feed 2 Carry wants to help you find the right people to create that ranked team you envision.
We also want help you better you skills and expierience with various Events and trainingsessions.
We want to create representative teams / rankedteams no matter which skill-class.
We request of you to treat the game with a professional attitude so that we can expierience the lost fun from the game together.
We want to make it possible for you to play the game without having to play with only randoms but to play with a team of friendly people and co√∂rdinated gametactics.

What do we have to offer?

- A nice , fun and close environment.
- Helping you find/make a team.
- A home for teams.
- A place for ranked teams to try and prevent them from going inactive.
- A profecionall view on your team.
- A structured community.
- We listen to your propositions.
- A chance to grow in our community to admin.
- A stuctured ts-server.

What do we have to offer you in the future?

- A proper webpage.
- A memberforum.
- A big platform to avoid randoms.
- Tons of events.
- An even better equipped adminteam.

Your qualifications.

- A 18 year old mental state.
- Appropriate behavior.
- The possibility to integrate.
- Participation in our society.
- Compliance of our TS-rules.
- A reliability to accept tasks.
- Compliance of your training times with your team. (if you are in one)
- A mature way of resolving conflicts.
- Respect for other players.
- Respect for the things Admins do for you.
- No slander.
- Open approach.
- Be able to handle criticism. (in a good way)
- The ability to express constructive criticism.
- The capability to self-reflect.

6.We are looking for recruiters.

- Managers for ranked teams.
- Managers for member recruitment.

7.How to contact us:

If you are intrested, have questions or you are just curious, please come by our TS-server and a Support/Moderator will come to you.

Support/Moderators: PaxOne, WarFackeR, DontHitThePanda

We are short on people to help you out at the moment so we kindly ask you to have some patience, we will try to help you as soon as we can. Thank you.

TS-Server: 212.224.121.11:5003

replies.body: no its like 2 guys feed 2 guys carry and 1 is afk  ;)

Warum schreiben einige Spezialisten im deutschen Bereich Englisch?

Edit: und das Englisch scheint auch nicht besonders gut zu sein.
